name: Gnome
description: Gnomes are magical folk created by gods of invention, illusions, and life underground. They are petite folk with big eyes and pointed ears, who live around 425 years. Many gnomes like the feeling of a roof over their head, even if that roof is nothing more than a hat.

Darkvision.description: You have Darkvision with a range of 60 feet.

Gnomish Cunning.description: You have Advantage on Intelligence, Wisdom, and Charisma saving throws.

effects.display: Advantage on INT, WIS, and CHA saves

traits.Gnomish Lineage: You are part of a lineage that grants you supernatural abilities. Choose Forest Gnome or Rock Gnome. Intelligence, Wisdom, or Charisma is your spellcasting ability for the spells you cast with this trait (choose when you select the lineage).
